text: Hanki kuma'ma kegava nehia ne'mo'a, Jesrili kuma have keginamofo agofetu mani'neno, Jehu naga neazageno nezmageno rankumapima mani'naza vahera anage huno kezatizamine, Ha' vahe neazage'na nezamagoe. Higeno ana kema Joramu'ma nentahino'a, mago vahe hunteno, ame hunka mago hosi afu erinka vunka, ana vahe'ma ome zamagenunka amne neazafi ha' eritma neaze? hunka ome zamantahigo.
